aircraft.value: Nighthawk Stealth - AC-8360-379 at Maintenance Hub-X

defect_observed.value: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 18/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 21/10/2023 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 19/10/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 22/10/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 26/10/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair
